modeling_capabilities_demonstrated: Output Control (OC) package configuration and timing specification
Variable output frequency across stress periods and time steps
Head file output control and binary file management
Budget file output control and cell-by-cell flow saves
Print format specification and list file output control
Multi-period simulation with transient and steady-state periods
Output control strategies for different analysis needs
flopy_features_tested: ModflowOc package initialization with stress period data
File extension and unit number management
Variable time stepping with output control coordination

aquifer_system_properties.layer_2: Confined aquifer, K = 5 m/d, constant transmissivity

pumping_system.period_5: No pumping for final steady state

output_control_strategies.save_all: Every time step - maximum data retention
output_control_strategies.monthly_saves: 12 saves per year for seasonal analysis
output_control_strategies.quarterly_saves: 4 saves per year for water balance
output_control_strategies.annual_saves: 1 save per year for long-term trends
output_control_strategies.critical_periods: Key time steps only for minimal storage
output_control_strategies.print_only: Text output to list file for review

advanced_oc_features.variable_frequency: Different output timing per stress period
advanced_oc_features.separate_head_budget: Independent control for heads vs budgets
advanced_oc_features.print_formats: Custom formatting for different data types

professional_applications: Water balance analysis and budget verification workflows
Time series analysis of heads and flows for trending
Model calibration with selective output for efficiency
Sensitivity analysis with targeted output control
Regulatory compliance with specified output formats
Climate change assessment with long-term analysis

output_control_best_practices.frequency_planning: Balance output needs with storage requirements
output_control_best_practices.critical_timing: Save outputs at key analysis time steps
output_control_best_practices.format_selection: Choose appropriate print formats for data type
output_control_best_practices.storage_optimization: Use compact formats for large models
output_control_best_practices.post_processing: Plan output timing for analysis workflows
output_control_best_practices.verification: Test output timing with smaller models first
output_control_best_practices.review_outputs: Print critical results for manual review

technical_implementation.unit_numbers: File unit assignment for output redirection
